transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yeah, hi sir, Samreen this side. Very good morning. How are you?
Executive: Ha, fine. Boliye boliye mam. Currently main hi dekh raha hu IndiaMART.
Customer: Okay, currently I am handling the services. Actually sir ne mujhe aapka number diya. I called on the secondary number. He said that mam is on I don't know. He asked me to call her. Again I called her but she was not taking up the call. So he asked me to connect on your number so that I have like connected on your number. Now you are handling the services of IndiaMART. I think that like I think mam or you like one of you like shown the interest for a video meeting at seller panel. Like we have the seller panel na.
Executive: Video meeting ke liye to humne Diwali se pehle interest show kiya tha. Uske baad to
Customer: Actually so sorry for the inconvenience but from like 18 na IndiaMART for one week or two week off pe tha. Matlab IndiaMART pura band tha ek week ke liye. Kariban 25th ko hamara office open hua. Hamare paas jo interest show hua hai na vaise wo hamare paas 18 ko nahi show hua hai. Hame 1 tarikh 1 November ko aaya hai ye interest. Tab se lekar main aap logo ko connect kar rahi hu mam ke number pe bahut baar kiya maine call but wo pick nahi hua fir jaake maine
Executive: Ha wo abhi abhi leave pe hai to abhi main hi dekh raha hu pura IndiaMART.
Customer: Chalo aap hi ko seekhna hoga na fir to aap hi ko ab use karna hai services ko.
Executive: Ha
Customer: Okay okay. To 1 November se hamare paas aaya tha interest. Kal se open ho gaya tha. Main aap mera number maine isliye whatsapp wala bhi aapko direct de diya hai ki main aapke account manager hu. Main aapko apna introduction deti hu. Maine abhi filhaal aapko recorded line se connect kiya hai. Mera ye wala number virtual number hai aur maine aapko direct number bhi whatsapp pe diya hai. Correct? Jo number hai na wo usse lag jata hai callback. Alright?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Main aapki account manager hu. Matlab ek tarike se samajhiye IndiaMART se support ke liye jo matlab training provide kar sake ya jo aapko guide kar sake wo main aapko karungi. Thik hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ha. Ab aapne seller panel aapke mobile application se on kiya hai ya laptop se on kiya hai?
Executive: Abhi main desktop mein chala raha hu.
Customer: Aap desktop pe use karte ho. Thik hai sahi hai. Yaha par desktop mein koi mail id bhi login hai kya sir?
Executive: Ha mera chrome wala hi login hai sales@chromeindiawala
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Ha meri khud ki lagi hai.
Customer: Maine wapas se aapko whatsapp pe hello ka message kiya hai kya wo mail id jo aapke system mein login hai wo aap mujhe share kar sakte ho?
Customer: Main na kya karungi screen share kar lungi. To main aapko guide kar deti hu.
Customer: Sales@india.com. Mere paas ye wali mail id thi vaise.
Executive: Ha isi pe hi maine mail kiya tha aur aapka contact bhi isi mail pe aaya tha.
Customer: Wo directly ab aapke paas number aa gaya na to aap mujhe directly reach out kar paoge ab.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Maine na appointment banayi hai. Agar aap mail ko refresh karoge to dekhoge ki samreen.banu@indiamart.com se aapke paas ek mail aaya hoga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aa gaya hai?
Executive: Ha aa gaya.
Customer: Usme na jaise aap click karoge to join with Google Meet aisa kuch likha aa raha hoga. Main bhi join kar rahi hu at the same time.
Executive: Ha aa gaya.
Customer: Thik hai. Mic waha pe se matlab abhi wo karenge. Join five minutes paath ka hi banaya hai maine but still aapne na kisi aur mail id se join kar rahe ho shayad aap. Sure se karo aap sahi mail id se join kar rahe ho?
Executive: Ye ho gaya na?
Customer: Aapne khud ki personal mail id se join kar liya hai kya aapne?
Executive: Ha nahi kiya sales wale se hi mail aaya aur isi se hi kiya hai.
Customer: Sales wale se join kiya hai aapne. Thik hai. Yaha pe na jaise abhi join hua hai to aap dekho niche kuch emoji bane hue hai jaise CC ka hai smile ka icon hai. Icon hai reaction ka matlab aur ek arrow hai square mein isme share screen likha aa raha hoga.
Executive: Ha kar diya chalo.
Customer: Uspe click karke jab aap uspe click karoge na share screen mein to usme teen option aate hai chrome tab ka window ka aur entire screen ka. To entire screen mein aapko tick karna hota hai actually. Thik hai? Niche ek chota sa window aa jata hai. Uspe click karke share ho jayega. Full screen share ho jayegi. Thik hai. Screen mujhe visible ho gayi hai. Ab aap IndiaMART wala open kar lijiye panel.
Customer: Aapke system mein mobile ka mic chalta hai kya? Sir aapke system ka mic chalta hai?
Executive: Nahi wo desktop hai na to nahi chalta hai.
Customer: Desktop pe waise desktop pe chalna chahiye tha speaker nahi hua. Koi issue nahi hai. Main aapko na apni taraf se ek baar line pe hi rahiyega aap kuch bhi idhar se udhar mat karega. Main call kar rahi hu aap uthaiyega bas thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a video meeting.

Resolution:

- Executive agreed to join Google Meet.

- Executive shared screen for guidance.

Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, screen share, account manager
